landing.summary: Enjoy playing on our online server for the GTA:SA-MP game mode. Buy a business and hire employees, make profits with your ventures, and stay safe at home. The only limit is you. Join our Discord to stay updated on the launch.

overview.tooltip: Let's know all about our server

forum.tooltip: Talk with someone else about the server

shop.tooltip: Do you want to buy something?

pcu.tooltip: Manage your account and related users

signin.helperText: First you need enter your username to verify your created account in Company Name S.A.
signin.helperText-2: Please, enter your password to continue.

error.title: Oops! Application error.
error.description: Something went wrong. We're experiencing technical difficulties. Please refresh the page or try again later.

reload.info: The page will reload in {{seconds}} seconds.

minigame.question: Would you like to try a minigame in the meantime?
